conclusion: Calculate the propagation time of monochromatic light in the water polo.

Calculate the speed of light in water.

The inner diameter of the ball is R.
The outer diameter of the ball is R + 8R/3 = 11R/3.
The angle between the light ray and the center of the ball is i = 30Â°.
The speed of light in vacuum is c.
The distance d between the center of the ball and the point of intersection is calculated using the Pythagorean theorem.
Calculate the speed of light in water using v = c/sqrt(1 - (v^2/c^2)).
The propagation time of monochromatic light in the water polo is t = 2sqrt(73R^2)/(3c).
